experiences.title: Software Engineer
experiences.subtitle: Napier Healthcare Solutions
workDescription: •Optimizing website performance and cross-browser compatibility to ensure a smooth and engaging user experience •Utilizing Bootstrap for responsive design techniques, ensuring websites are optimized for mobile devices •Initiating and successfully executing an independent Proof of Concept (POC) within a challenging timeframe of 10 days, •Enhancing rendering performance across frontend applications, achieving a remarkable 50% improvement in overall efficiency •Proficiently integrating APIs with the UI across all applications, ensuring seamless communication between frontend interfaces and backend systems. •Actively participating in Agile methodologies, contributing to sprint planning, daily standups, and sprint retrospectives to ensure efficient project management and delivery. •Collaborating closely with cross-functional teams, prioritizing tasks, identifying dependencies, and driving iterative development cycles according to Agile principles. •Implementing SonarQube as a comprehensive code quality analysis tool, addressing and resolving all code-quality challenges effectively. •Refactoring legacy codes to improve maintainability without affecting existing features. •Translating design concepts into impactful solutions, contributing to the success of tech products and businesses.•Conducting thorough testing & debugging of web applications to identify & resolve issues.
